channel.title: Freddy Sheppard on
channel.description: Recent content in Freddy Sheppard on

item.title: Freddy Shepherd offers £60m for Newcastle United
item.description: ### Shepherd - Front runner for Newcastle takeover? - hopefully not Surprisingly , the BBC have taken a time out from Wimbledon and have broken a story that I will lead to many. Apparently if all goes well, Newcastle will be sold by then end of the month, but we’re nearly there and there hasn’t been any signs of a takeover happening. However now, as we already know Shepherd is interested and is as reported leading the race with a £60m bid, which is expected to be accepted by Mike Ashley.
